29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Removed casts from direct SQL also in task "Excel"
26.11.2012 JH SCR17709 Removed casts from direct SQL
14.08.2012 JH SCR17500 Replaced activation of Excel via UFB577 with GB323 - ActivateExcel

Only allow subtask to be accessed as long as no other action initiated

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH410A1]: Received payments by bank per month')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT year(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE), month(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE), BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CURRENCY, cast(sum (BADT.BADT_NPAYMENTS) as decimal(9,0)), cast(sum (BADT.BADT_DEBITSCURRH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BADT.BADT_CREDITSCURRH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum (BADT.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS) as decimal(13,2)), count(*) as NUMBER_OF_ACOUNT_STATEMENTS FROM :1/BADT AS BADT, :1/BANK AS BANK, :1/ADMU AS ADMU WHERE BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE BETWEEN ':2' and ':3'and BANK.BANK_ADMNO = BADT.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BANK.BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT.BADT_BANK_ADMNO = ADMU.ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':4' GROUP BY year(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE), month(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE), BADT_BANK_ADMNO,BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CURRENCY ORDER BY BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO FOR FETCH ONLY

SELECT year(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE),month(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE),cast(BADT_BANK_ADMNO as decimal(4,0)),cast(BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO as decimal(9,0)),BANK_NAME,BANK_CURRENCY,cast(sum (BADT.BADT_NPAYMENTS) as decimal(9,0)),cast(sum (BADT.BADT_DEBITSCURRH) as decimal(13,2)),cast(sum(BADT.BADT_CREDITSCURRH) as decimal(13,2)),cast(sum (BADT.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS) as decimal(13,2)),count(*) as NUMBER_OF_ACOUNT_STATEMENTS FROM :1/BADT AS BADT, :1/BANK AS BANK WHERE BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE BETWEEN ':2' and ':3'and BANK.BANK_ADMNO = BADT.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BANK.BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO GROUP BY year(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE),month(BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE), BADT_BANK_ADMNO,BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BANK_NAME,BANK_CURRENCY

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Admno.')&';'&MlsTrans ('Bankcode')&';'&MlsTrans ('Bank name')&';'&MlsTrans ('Curr.')&';'&MlsTrans ('Number of payments')&';'&MlsTrans ('Total debit')&';'&MlsTrans ('Total credit')&';'&MlsTrans ('Total amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Number of account statements')
